scripts.build:css: bun build static/css/index.css --outdir static/dist --minify && bun -e "import {readFileSync, writeFileSync} from 'node:fs'; import {brotliCompressSync} from 'node:zlib'; const inPath='static/dist/index.css'; const outPath='static/dist/index.css.br'; writeFileSync(outPath, brotliCompressSync(readFileSync(inPath)));"
